# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(popper_backend LANGUAGES CXX C)

add_executable(popper_backend "" src/main.cpp src/Operand.cpp)




# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/bin/gcc")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/bin/g++")
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
set_target_properties(popper_backend PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "popper-backend")
set_target_properties(popper_backend PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(popper_backend PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(popper_backend PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(popper_backend PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(popper_backend PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(popper_backend PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET popper_backend PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(popper_backend PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(popper_backend PRIVATE
    src/Bytecode.cpp
    src/main.cpp
        src/Operand.cpp
)
